name: Pop It Fidget Trading Toys 3D
description:
This great game will be the best fun anywhere, anytime, for both adults and children! While playing, you will get a lot of positive emotions and fun leisure time. The application will allow you to try out the most popular modern toys that help relieve stress.
Trade unique toys, learn to read your opponent's psychology, use your trading techniques, use the infamous scam tactics, or trade with honor! It all depends on your playing style.
Make profitable trades and become an expert Fidget Toys.
Regular play with anti-stress toys is a simple and reliable way to improve your mental and emotional health. A large selection of toys makes the game more varied.
Install the app and calm your nerves wherever you are! It is so relaxing and cool that it will bring you endless pleasure!
PREMIUM FEATURES:
* Huge collection of unique toys
* Trading mode
* Unlimited game time and lives
* All levels unlock
Important - you need subscription to use the app! There are no free functional inside!
* Upon confirmation of purchase of your subscription, payment will be charged to your iTunes account.
* Subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period and payment is charged to your iTunes account.
The renewal cost depends on your subscription plan. Our standard subscription plan - 1 week subscription is $5.99
For other currencies, the price matches the price level in the App Store Price Matrix.
* Subscription with a free trial period automatically renews to a paid subscription. You can cancel or manage the automatic renewal of the free trial by going to your Account Settings after purchase. Cancellation will take effect 24 hours after the last day of the current subscription period and you will be transferred to a free service.
* Please note: Any unused portion of the three-day free trial period (if offered) will be forfeited when purchasing a premium subscription during the free trial period.
* For any other information, see our privacy policy and terms of use.
Privacy Policy: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1mHakmX38Z_0YM5yjfS5yR_75R1gyA7uOSvnpzllcVm0/edit?usp=sharing
Terms of Use: https://docs.google.com/document/d/14FfavsbWzzgTIp4SKvVwljz8Fy_ububXoHLFW5vhUEs/edit?usp=sharing
